ValidationRule.description: You can't cancel the order when the stage of the order is "Creation in Progress", Production in progress
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT($User.BypassVR__c), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'LV_Interface_Datastage', ISPICKVAL (StageName, "In Progress") ,
ISCHANGED( SPO_StopBriefReason__c ),
OR ( AND (ISPICKVAL (ApplicationSource__c, "SPO"), NOT ( ISPICKVAL ( SPO_OrderType__c, "MTO on Catalog (Hardsided)")), NOT ( SPO_DisplayOrder__c )), ISPICKVAL (ApplicationSource__c, "ECO"), AND (ISPICKVAL (ApplicationSource__c, "PERSO"), CreatedDate + 3 < NOW()) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't cancel the order anymore
